Keywords: order flow tick-level aggressor side signed volume liquidity
Data Requirements: aggTrades (tick-level), price, quantity, is_buyer_maker, timestamp
Best For: High-frequency futures, liquid crypto pairs, institutional execution
Key Parameters: Decay tau (2-30s), Prediction horizon (5-60s), Threshold (±2.0)
Performance Characteristics: IC: 0.03-0.08, Sharpe: 1.5-3.5 annualized, Mean reversion at tails
Market Conditions: High volatility, liquid markets, during active hours
Avoid For: Illiquid markets low tick volume thin books

Keywords: hawkes self-exciting intensity kernel arrival rate clustering bursty
Data Requirements: aggTrades, inter-arrival times, event timestamps
Best For: Detecting sweeps, momentum ignition, liquidity crises, algorithmic detection
Key Parameters: α (excitation), β (decay), baseline λ₀, dual timescales (fast/slow)
Performance Characteristics: Captures clustering, predicts continuation after sweeps, non-linear tail behavior
Market Conditions: Momentum regimes, large sweeps, algo activity bursts
Avoid For: Stable quiet markets low event density mean-reverting regimes

Keywords: kalman latent state bayesian filtering gaussian noise time-varying adaptive
Data Requirements: Directional signal (signed trades), irregular timestamps
Best For: Smoothing noisy signals, regime detection, adaptive execution, order placement
Key Parameters: Process noise Q, Measurement noise R (0.25), Adaptive α
Performance Characteristics: Highest IC (0.05-0.12), smoothest signal, optimal under Gaussian assumptions
Market Conditions: Stable trending markets, normal volatility regimes
Avoid For: High-noise chaotic markets regime shifts without adaptation

Keywords: exponential decay pressure gauge momentum density aggression accumulator
Data Requirements: Signed trades or signed volume, timestamps
Best For: Sweep detection, pressure measurement, tail monotonicity, momentum confirmation
Key Parameters: Decay constant τ (618ms optimal), Input scaling
Performance Characteristics: Extreme tail predictability, monotonic at |S| > 3σ, detects one-sided flow
Market Conditions: All markets (universal), best during sweeps/liquidations
Avoid For: Absent for balanced two-way markets

Keywords: vwap volume-weighted participation tracking minimize impact benchmark

Best For: Large order execution, institutional trading, minimizing market impact, benchmarking
Key Parameters: Target participation rate (5-20%), Time slices, Urgency parameter
Performance Characteristics: Minimize slippage vs. VWAP, tracking error ≤10bps typical
Market Conditions: Normal volume patterns, liquid instruments during regular hours
Avoid For: Illiquid low-volume periods breaking news events

Keywords: twap time-weighted uniform slicing predictable simple benchmark
Data Requirements: Price data, timestamps (no volume needed)
Best For: Simple execution, regulatory compliance, predictable flow, avoiding detection
Key Parameters: Time slices (uniform), Total duration, Slice size
Performance Characteristics: Even execution pace, higher impact than VWAP if volume spikes, simple to audit
Market Conditions: Stable markets, regular hours, when volume profile unknown
Avoid For: High volatility breaking news volume surges

Keywords: stat-arb cointegration spread mean-reversion correlation z-score

Performance Characteristics: Sharpe 1.0-2.5, market-neutral, relies on reversion speed
Market Conditions: Stable correlations, normal volatility, tight spreads
Avoid For: Correlation breakdowns regime shifts one-sided trends

Keywords: market-making bid-ask spread inventory risk adverse-selection quote

Key Parameters: Spread width (tick multiples), Inventory limits (±max position), Skew adjustment
Performance Characteristics: Profit from spread capture, risk from adverse selection, needs high fill rate
Market Conditions: Stable markets with consistent two-way flow, good depth
Avoid For: Directional trends low liquidity toxic flow

Keywords: momentum trend breakout moving average crossover donchian channel
Data Requirements: OHLC bars, volume, ATR for volatility

Key Parameters: MA periods (50/200), ATR multiplier (2-3x), Breakout lookback (20-55d)
Performance Characteristics: Sharpe 0.5-1.5, large drawdowns, skewed PnL (many small losses, few big wins)
Market Conditions: Strong trends, breakouts, low-correlation regime
Avoid For: Range-bound choppy markets mean-reverting assets

Keywords: mean-reversion oversold overbought rsi bollinger-bands z-score contrarian

Market Conditions: Sideways markets, high volatility, after overextensions
Avoid For: Strong trends breakouts momentum regimes

Keywords: grid ranging levels buy-low-sell-high automation rebalancing

Avoid For: Strong trends breakouts one-way markets

Keywords: iceberg hidden-liquidity order-detection volume-analysis tape-reading

Avoid For: Low liquidity retail-dominated markets

Avoid For: Low dispersion correlated moves bear markets
